name: Latig0sx
body:
### Usage

**1) Check your System Configuration**

    $ sudo ./latigo-check -u <user>

**2) System Hardening**

    $ sudo ./latigo-hardening -u <user>


### Features

    Check System Hardware
    Check Global System Settings
    Check System Preferences
    Check Accounts
    Check Network Services
    System Hardening


**Compliance with the common NSA criteria**

### Screenshots

![Check](http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/9882/auditing.png)
![Hardening](http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/9039/hardening.png)
